remarks: Negation in a ring is the same as left multiplication by ` -u 1 ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
statement:
ringneg.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringneg.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
ringneg.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
ringneg.4 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
ringneg.5 $e |- U = ( GId ` H ) $.
rngonegmn1l $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( ( N ` U ) H A ) ) $.
